item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

case 4121:
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(3460, 1));
c.startAnimation(482);
c.getItems().deleteItem(3460, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2147000000);
c.sendMessage(“you have recieved max cash”);
} else if{
if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(3460, 0));
c.sendMessage(“Sorry You need the key!”);
break;

that fixes first issue, orphaned you have to add under somewhere that it belongs find the tutorial u used and find where it asked for u to place it

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

Hi i am adding a chest to my server.
it works and i just realized i want to add something to message the person
if they dont have the key i tried to make it say"Sorry you need the key"!
here is my code:

case 4121: if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(3460, 1)); c.startAnimation(482); c.getItems().deleteItem(3460, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995, 2147000000); c.sendMessage("you have recieved max cash"); } else { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(3460, 0)); c.sendMessage("Sorry You need the key!"); break;
here is my error:

Ive tried multiple ways and i just cant fix it? Can someone fix my code
PS: This is a PI Source.
HELP WOULD BE VERY APRECIATIVE! THANK YOU FOR ALL WHO HAVE READ. AND People THAT WILL/DO POST
